### Call for Proposals: Knowledge Synthesis on Educational Options for Out of School Children

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01006788

**Status**: Expired

**Posting Date**: 2022-09-12

**Closing Date**: 2022-10-07 11:00:00 AM EST

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Tendering

### Overview

The International Development Research Centre (IDRC) invites firms to submit proposals for the support of a consultant to conduct a knowledge synthesis on educational options for children and youth who are out of school and at risk of dropping out. The consultant will be responsible for identifying key themes, effective methods, processes, and approaches to synthesize emerging findings from four Knowledge & Innovation Exchange (KIX)-funded projects.

**Objective**

The objective of this research is to synthesize existing knowledge and identify key findings from the four KIX-funded projects on educational options for out of school children and youth. The consultant will develop a report that provides an overview of the current state of knowledge in this area, as well as recommendations for future research and program development.

**Consultant Responsibilities**

* Identify key themes and concepts related to educational options for out of school children and youth
* Synthesize existing knowledge from the four KIX-funded projects
* Develop a comprehensive report that outlines the current state of knowledge in this area, as well as recommendations for future research and program development

**Eligibility Criteria**

* Consulting services experience in international development and education
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively as part of a team
* Fluency in English (writing and speaking)

### Tender Requirements

The procurement process for this project will be competitive open tendering. Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through [JeS (user interface)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). A non-disclosure agreement (NDA) is not required.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact Lindsay Empey, Business Development Team, at  lempey@idrc.ca.

**Attachments**

A detailed calling document that outlines the full scope of work is available at the following link: [attaching URL:  link to document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/12/2eb6b9ccfcb9aac5d1e5f51881dedc73/rfp22230011.pdf).
